item.title: MicroKernel Learning: SeL4
item.description: seL4 Capabilities In seL4, capabilities are stored in C-space. Kernel object is made up of several C-nodes, just like a page table made up of individual page tables. Each C-nodes is an array of cap slots, which contain capability.
